attributes.action: Change the law to ensure the felling or pruning of ANY tree is subject to statutory approval
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The trimming and felling of trees must, as a means of ensuring environmental protection, be controlled. Mature trees (i.e. over 5 years old) – whether or not privately or publicly owned - should only be felled or trimmed if agreement is provided by the statutory authorities - either the Planning Authority or the Environment Agency.
